<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elemental Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=2546) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 99 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the Inner Sphere. You gain the trained proficiency in your choice of [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) and either [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) or [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10). If you would automatically become trained in Survival (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in the [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) associated with your Elemental Plane of origin (such as [Plane of Fire](/Planes.aspx?ID=6) Lore).
name: Elemental Lore
